Observed attempts to read/write sensitiv.Action: Monitor Windows Event Logs (specifically Sysmon Event ID 9 - RawAccessRead) for processes accessing raw disk device paths (e.g., \\.\PhysicalDrive*). Identify unexpected processes attempting raw disk access. Analyze process lineage and frequency of such events. Use correlation analysis to link raw disk access events with preceding or concurrent suspicious activity.

Detection of unusual kernel driver insta.Data: Windows Event ID (System), Network device logs (AAA)
Detection of unusual kernel driver insta.Action: Monitor Windows System Event Logs for new kernel driver installations (Event ID related to Service Control Manager creating new service/driver). Analyze the frequency and source of driver installations. Monitor network device AAA logs for 'erase' or configuration deletion commands executed on critical devices. Apply time series analysis to identify anomalous spikes in driver installations or 'erase' commands outside of planned maintenance windows.
